meanings.sent1: She was dupping her friend by pretending to be sick.
meanings.sent2: The magician was dupping the audience with his disappearing act.

meanings.sent4: The con artist was dupping people out of their money with fake investment schemes.
meanings.sent5: The cunning fox was dupping the farmer by stealing his chickens.
